questionTitle: Which of the following is the audio streaming application by Microsoft?
questionExplanation: Skype is a telecommunications application software product that specializes in providing video chat and voice calls from the computer.

questionOption1: Streaming files are a way of delivering large content in pieces so playback can begin more quickly
questionOption2: Streaming is used for broadcasting current events
questionOption3: Cloud computing provides large storage for maintaining libraries
questionExplanation: Cloud computing has a number of advantages that aid content providers and delivery systems.

questionTitle: How many types of streamed material exist for audio/video streaming applications?
questionExplanation: Streamed material can be live or on-demand.

questionTitle: Which of the following streaming is also called progressive download?
questionExplanation: Live streaming is called progressive streaming.

questionOption1: Video streaming was among the first media applications to find widespread use on the Internet
questionOption2: VoIP is a form of audio streaming with a set of specialized protocols
questionOption3: Broadband connections and low-cost infrastructure have made video streaming services widely available
questionExplanation: Cloud computing has expanded the use of streamed audio to make radio, Webcasts, music sites, and other services widely available.

questionTitle: Which of the following streaming occurs from the material that is already stored to disk?
questionExplanation: Streaming media are files that are sent in pieces by service and played back by a client as the delivery continues.

questionTitle: When a live stream is sent a multicast to 1,000 concurrent users at 500 kbps, the number of megabytes transferred is _______________
questionExplanation: Formula for data transfer is: MB transferred = Bandwidth x Time x Number of Users.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a stream sent from a service to an individual user?
questionExplanation: For many content services, such as the music services Last FM and Rhapsody, a vast number of files are being served to individual users and they go out using unicast protocols as individual streams.

questionTitle: Applications that protect streamed content by playing the part of the file and discarding it are more aptly referred to as _________
questionExplanation: Even if delivery is always over a WAN connection, CDN (Content Delivery Network) still offers enormous inefficiencies.

questionTitle: Which of the following transmission protocol is used in case of a streamed media scenario?
questionExplanation: UDP stands for user datagram protocol.
